schemes.name: Central Sector Scheme on Formation and Promotion of 10,000 FPOs
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare / SFAC / NABARD / NCDC
schemes.description: Supports formation and promotion of Farmer Producer Organisations with financial assistance and structured handholding for five years.
schemes.benefits: Equity grants, credit guarantee support, capacity building and professional handholding.
schemes.eligibility: Registered Farmer Producer Organisations promoted through approved implementing agencies.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Implementing Agencies, SFAC, NABARD or NCDC.

schemes.name: SFAC Equity Grant & Credit Guarantee Scheme (EGCGS)
schemes.description: Provides equity grants and credit guarantee coverage to strengthen FPO financial capacity.
schemes.benefits: Improved access to institutional credit and business scaling support.
schemes.eligibility: Registered Farmer Producer Companies with audited financial records.

schemes.name: NABARD Producer Organisation Development Fund (PODF)
schemes.department: National Bank for Agriculture & Rural Development (NABARD)
schemes.description: Supports formation, incubation, training and business development of Producer Organisations.
schemes.benefits: Training, incubation, professional support and business planning assistance.
schemes.eligibility: Registered FPOs, cooperatives and farmer collectives promoted by partner agencies.

schemes.name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH) – FPO Components
schemes.description: Supports horticulture-based FPO clusters for post-harvest management, processing and market linkage.
schemes.benefits: Infrastructure support, value addition and market access for horticulture FPOs.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Horticulture Mission or FPO clusters.

schemes.name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF) – FPO Infrastructure Support
schemes.description: Provides financial support for FPO-led warehouses, cold storage and processing infrastructure.
schemes.benefits: Interest subvention and long-term credit support.
schemes.eligibility: Registered FPOs and cooperatives creating community infrastructure.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through AIF portal or lending banks.

schemes.name: NABARD – Producers Organisation Promoting Institutions (POPIs) Programme
schemes.department: National Bank for Agriculture & Rural Development (NABARD)
schemes.description: Supports institutions that promote, mentor and nurture Farmer Producer Organisations.
schemes.benefits: Professional mentoring, governance support and institutional strengthening.
